I've got game running multiplayer perfectly using another crack. But i am curious: does this crack enable MP ?
I got a crack from rlslog and it was infected. Problem was the AV didn't see it... Anyway, go into c:\users\\AppData\Local - look for svchost.exe, if you got it, you're infected. It's a keylogger.
